snippet: “Toy Story That Time Forgot” and “The Robot Chicken Lots of Holidays but Don’t Worry Christmas Is Still in There Too” are just two of the recent holiday television specials.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger compares animated Christmas television specials Toy Story That Time Forgot, on ABC, and The Robot Chicken Lots of Holidays but Don’t Worry Christmas Is Still in There Too, on Adult Swim.
lead_paragraph: “Toy Story That Time Forgot” and “The Robot Chicken Lots of Holidays but Don’t Worry Christmas Is Still in There Too” are just two of the recent holiday television specials.

headline.seo: ‘Toy Story’ and ‘Robot Chicken’ Spawn Holiday Specials
headline.main: Santa, Please: Ignore the Existential Questions
headline.print_headline: Santa, Please: Ignore the Existential Questions
